Posts.Content: Hi thanks for the tip, will try to get one sorted.  Good Luck. Juliex
Posts.Title: Wigs

Posts.Content: Hi have just recently lost all my hair after first lot of Chemo, have got two wigs, one from the NHS and another off ebay, both are a little uncomfortable to wear against my bals head, is there anything I csn do or buy that may help to ease the discomfort, any suggestions will be greatly appreciated. Thanks Julie x
Posts.Title: Wigs

Posts.Content: Hi Alex, thanks for your help, will look into these caps. Did get a wig free on the NHS but don't like it on, so will see about getting it cut. Take care Julie x
